name: Andy's War Hall
description:
Keys:

w, a, s, d to move

1: Switch to revolver (single fire, AOE damage)

2: Switch banana gun (auto fire, single damage)

Goal:

Defend the almighty soup can in the middle

Andy's War Hall

Much like the abstract expressionist movement, Andy's other pieces of art are unhappy with the attention afforded to his Campbell's soup piece. It's war! Protect your precious piece from your lesser creations

The Revolver shoots bananas and the banana shoots revolvers.. obviously
